MemoryInfobox.description: 'With a threat looming over Achaia and the order of the Ancients|Order stalking them, Darius and Kassandra decided to eliminate the dangers they faced.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage'

General_Description: '''Chasing the Storm''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: After a discussion with [[Natakas]] and [[Darius]], Kassandra went ahead and investigated several leads about [[Phila|The Tempest]] in [[Boura]] and [[Patrai]].
Section_Outcome: Kassandra gathered vital information on the Tempest and also loosened her grip on [[Achaia]], killing her right-hand lieutenant [[Megakreon]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage]]''
